events.message: I recently purchased a jacket from your store, but it does not fit as expected. I would like to request a refund for this item as soon as possible.
The case has been identified as related to a refund request based on the customer's mention of returning the product and wanting their money back.
Your request has been assigned to one of our refund specialists who will handle this issue promptly.
Hello! Thank you for reaching out. I understand you want to request a refund for your jacket. I'm here to help you with the process.
Could you please provide your order number and confirm if the item is unused and in its original packaging to proceed with the refund?
Sure, my order number is 789456123. The jacket is still unworn and in the packaging it came with when delivered.
Thank you for the information. We have approved your refund request and you will receive the amount back within 5 to 7 business days after we receive the returned jacket.
Thanks for the quick response and approval. I appreciate your assistance and will send the jacket back today.
We have received the returned jacket and processed your refund successfully. You should see the credit on your payment method shortly.
Just checking in to confirm that the refund amount has appeared in your account. Please let us know if you have any further questions or need assistance.
Since the refund has been completed and no further issues were reported, we are closing this case. Thank you for contacting us.
